location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Panorama taken from near Manzil spring looking towards Amir Chah i.e. westwards the Koh-i-Sultan 7700 ft. in the distance. Sand drifts in foreground’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Black and white photograph of panoramic view showing sand dunes in the foreground, and the Koh-i-Sultan volcano in the background.Inscriptions:Centre, below image, in pen: ‘Panorama taken from near Manzil spring looking towards Amir Chah i.e. westwards the Koh-i-Sultan 7700 ft. in the distance. Sand drifts in foreground’.
